posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc S.
will pay top dollar or consider trades.

Posted By: Craig W
Hi Marc,

Sorry, but I don't think it's possible to have a Sovereign 460 back for Doolan Batting.  Doolan Batting is in the 350/460 Regular Series and Sovereign 460 backs are only possible in the 350/460 Super Series and the 460 Only Series.  You might check with Ted Z or Scot R to confirm.

Regards,

Craig
